fact.fact_aligned_sentence: 鹰嘴豆泥或鹰嘴豆沙(阿拉伯语:حمص بطحينة、拉丁化:ḥummuṣ bi-ṭ-ṭaḥīna)是黎凡特食物。鹰嘴豆泥常与蔬菜、面包和烤肉一同供应。

src_context: 鹰嘴豆泥或鹰嘴豆沙(阿拉伯语:حمص بطحينة、拉丁化:ḥummuṣ bi-ṭ-ṭaḥīna)是黎凡特食物。
鹰嘴豆泥常与蔬菜一同供应。
鹰嘴豆泥常与面包一同供应。
tgt_fact_aligned_sentences: Hummus is usually garnished with olive oil, "nana" mint leaves, paprika, and parsley.
Hummus is usually garnished with olive oil, "nana" mint leaves, paprika, and parsley.
It is also served as part of a meze or as an accompaniment to falafel, grilled chicken, fish, or eggplant.

fact.original: 鹰嘴豆泥可以加入大蒜。
